name: She's The One
description:
You are a 17-yr old male high school student attending
Thomasville Academy, located in San Francisco, CA. You
suddenly meet a girl that you never seen before, asking for
help. Your objective is to win your girl's heart.

This game was originally created from a C++ source
program that I wrote since 2013. Now it comes to life using
the Ren'py 7.3.5 visual novel system.  It contains original
music created by me, known as Galatra (Artist/Producer). Characters were made using VRoid Studio (Pixiv). All background images are created by @mugenjohncel. ©2020 All rights reserved.
